short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Release the full power of ChatGPT prompts with ChatOverlay - boost your AI conversational experience with over 1000 prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the full power of conversational AI with the ChatOverlay  - your one-stop chrome extension to boost your AI conversational experiences. This tool serves as a comprehensive database of prompts specifically designed for ChatGPT, with options to customize tone, language, and many more parameters to tailor the AI responses as per your needs.

Not just that, our extension goes beyond English, supporting multiple languages, thereby transcending linguistic barriers in AI interactions. Whether you want the AI to sound professional for a business query, casual for a friendly conversation, or creative for a brainstorming session, you're just a click away.

Key Features:

Expansive Prompts Library: Access an extensive database of handcrafted and AI-optimized prompts, categorized across various themes, industries, and conversational scenarios.

Customized Tone Selection: Choose from a range of tones such as professional, casual, humorous, empathetic, and many more to set the mood of the conversation.

Multilingual Support: Interact with ChatGPT in multiple languages. Perfect for non-native English speakers or when you want to converse in a different language.

Frequent Updates: The prompts library is continuously updated with fresh inputs, ensuring that you always have new and relevant prompts to use.

User-friendly Interface: Easy navigation and prompt selection features make the user experience smooth and hassle-free.

Whether you're a writer seeking inspiration, a student studying AI, a business professional in need of quick responses, or just an AI enthusiast, the ChatOverlay extension brings the world of conversational AI to your fingertips, enhancing your productivity and creativity manifold.
